Control Name: 2.3.3 Recovery targets such as Recovery Time Objective (RTO) and Recovery Point Objective (RPO) are defined for the application and key scenarios
Control Statement: Are recovery targets such as Recovery Time Objective (RTO) and Recovery Point Objective (RPO) defined for the application and/or key scenarios?

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.3 Have you defined key scenarios for your workload and how they relate to operational targets and non-functional requirements?
